definition: "roof" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 40), occurring in 家, 定, 安 etc/see also 寶蓋|宝盖[bao3 gai4]
lit. wind from an empty cave (idiom)/fig. unfounded (story)/baseless (claim)
temple (on the sides of human head)
(of itinerant entertainers) to tour, playing in many venues
to hit a pressure point (martial arts)/dim mak/see also 點脈|点脉[dian3 mai4]
to live in a cave/(of animals) to be of burrowing habit

sentences.english: I still heard them even in Asian dens and German gutters.
sentences.chinese: 我仍然聽見了他們甚而在亞洲穴和德國天溝。

sentences.english: EA at Neiguan(PC 6) has a good regulative action on stable angina pectoris.
sentences.chinese: 電針內關穴對穩定型心絞痛具有良好的調整作用。

sentences.english: Applying needles at pressure points is thought to trigger electrical pulses that suppress appetite.
sentences.chinese: 將細針紮在壓力穴可以誘發抑制食慾的神經電脈衝。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To observe the anti inflammatory effect of Xuetie Dingchuan Plaster.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察穴貼定喘膏的抗炎作用。

sentences.english: In the wild, females build nests by digging tunnels and chambers in the soil, in which they lay their eggs.
sentences.chinese: 在野外，雌性靠在土裏挖穴建巢，她們將在這裏產卵。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the efficacy of Huatuo Jaji points for treating chronic gastritis patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察採用華佗夾脊穴治療慢性胃炎的療效。

sentences.english: Objective To assess therapeutic effect of acupuncture at Jiaji (EX-B 2) on hyperosteogeny of lumbar vertebrae.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價針刺夾脊穴爲主治療腰椎骨質增生症的療效。

sentences.english: The food is listed under the fingertips missing points .
sentences.chinese: 而食指尖下就是列缺穴天津按摩。

sentences.english: You are of the half-open door, and dig the grave hole will wait outside the door.
sentences.chinese: 你們是半開的門，而挖墳穴的人就等在門外。

sentences.english: He at once clipped the Jackdaw's wings, and taking him home at night, gave him to his children.
sentences.chinese: 晚上，牧羊人把這隻穴烏帶回家，拿給孩子們看。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of Lasix injected into Fuliu acupoint (KI7) on urine volume.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察復溜穴注射速尿對尿量的影響。

sentences.english: Three little fish waist, with both hands thumb end to press into fish waist hole 36 times.

sentences.english: Then he went down and stayed in a cave in the rock of Etam.

sentences.english: The branch devoted to the use of pressure points to restore energy flow is called the practice of acupressure.
sentences.chinese: 這種着重於以按穴恢復能量脈流的分支就是指壓按摩。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo ascertain the curative effect of deep puncture of point Tianshu (ST 25) on colic slow-transport constipation.
sentences.chinese: 目的明確深刺天樞穴對結腸慢轉運性便祕的療效。

definition: acupuncture point (any point on any meridian)/category of 12 specific acupuncture points near the wrist or ankle, each lying on a different meridian (one of five categories collectively termed 五輸穴|五输穴)
(literary) hip bone/(TCM) space between two joints
Quchi acupoint LI11, at the lateral end of the elbow crease
"eight wind points", name of a set of acupuncture points (EX-LE-10), four on each foot
